Barack Obama !( CNN)-- Bill Clinton Secretary of State Colin Powell announced Sunday that he will be voting for Barack Obama , citing the Democrat's "ability to inspire" and the "inclusive nature of his campaign." I think he is a transformational figure, he is a new generation coming onto the world stage, onto the American stage, and for that reason I'll be voting for Barack Obama , Colin Powell said on NBC's "Meet the Press." Eric Schmidt drew fire for responding to a hypothetical question posed at a forum in Washington, D.C., about an implant that would let Google Inc. know what its users were thinking. He responded that Google Inc. 's policy is to get right up to the creepy line and not cross it, and an implant would cross the line.
